snippet.title: [Game-play Clip] IZANAGI ONLINE Samurai Ninja MMORPG
snippet.description:
IZANAGI ONLINE takes place in apocalyptic world with old civilizations where your goal is to be the best Ninja in the Fifth continent by completing missions in each area.
"You can experience exciting battles using various skills and jumps in this massive vast world with full 3D high-definition graphics, real time communications such as cooperative play and chats on your iPhone, iPad, iPad mini, iPod touch and Android.
"

Characters are designed by Takashi Okazaki best known for Afro Samurai, with game development using the UNREAL ENGINE 3 to depict the unique worlds.

IZANAGI ONLINE official site: http://en.izanagi.com/
